Sentencas: Ion transport in solid oxide electrolytes is a key process involved in advanced green energy conversion devices such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Conventional SOFC electrolytes require a high operational temperature (over 700 degrees C) to maintain considerable bulk and grain boundary diffusion of the ions to enable sufficient ionic conductivity for efficient fuel cell operation.
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The present study explores a novel ion conduction expressway in an amorphous/crystalline heterostructure, La0 center dot 8Sr0 center dot 2Al0 center dot 8Zn0 center dot 2O3-delta (LSAZ), which can boost the mobility of ions at a relatively low temperature (450-550 degrees C) for SOFCs.
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The LSAZ heterostructure includes an insulating perovskite core and a superionic-conducting amorphous surface layer.
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This electrolyte exhibits a superior conductivity of 0.319 S cm(-1) at 550 degrees C, and it is employed in a SOFC which demonstrates a remarkable performance of 1296 mW cm(-2) at 550 degrees C, which is 300 times higher than a SOFC with the LSAZ being densified at 1400 degrees C for 10
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: h. A superionic conducting amorphous surface layer enriched by high oxygen vacancy defects facilitates ionic conduction along the grain boundary and interfaces between the nanoparticles of LSAZ.
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our finding provides an efficient way to design advanced highly conductive electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cells to be operated at reduced temperatures.
Titulo: Fast ion-conductive electrolyte based on a doped LaAlO3 with an amorphous surface layer for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
